rules.natural: If the mechanic uses alcohol, then the workshop is safe.
Either the mechanic uses alcohol or the mechanic operates the vehicle.
Provided that the mechanic sharpens the tool, if the tool is not functional then it is not broken.
Whenever the mechanic assembles the furniture, the workshop is safe.
Given that the mechanic disassembles the furniture, the workshop is safe.
If the mechanic measures the furniture, then in case neither the mechanic assembles the furniture nor disassembles the furniture, the furniture is not stable.
Either the mechanic measures the furniture or the mechanic levels the furniture.
If the mechanic levels the furniture, then the mechanic secures the furniture.
Either the supervisor is present, or if the mechanic secures the furniture, then given that neither the mechanic assembles the furniture nor disassembles the furniture, the furniture is not stable.

If the workshop requires documentation, then unless it is not the case that if the mechanic tests the tool then when the tool is not functional it is not broken, and cleaning is not documented, cleaning is approved.
Either the mechanic checks the certification or the mechanic verifies the certification.

Provided that the mechanic verifies the certification, if it is not the case that whenever neither the mechanic assembles the furniture nor disassembles the furniture the furniture is not stable, then the furniture is not certified.
If the inspection passed, then the inspection failed.
Whenever the mechanic repairs the vehicle, the workshop is safe.
Either the mechanic is available in the workshop, or if the mechanic operates the vehicle, the mechanic repairs the vehicle.
If the tool is functional, then the workshop is safe.
Given that the mechanic cleans the tool, if the tool is not functional then it is not broken.
Either the mechanic cleans the tool or the mechanic inspects the tool.
If the mechanic inspects the tool, then the mechanic tests the tool.
If the mechanic tests the tool, then the mechanic sharpens the tool.
If neither the mechanic assembles the furniture nor disassembles the furniture, then the furniture is stable.
If it is not the case that if maintenance is scheduled then whenever the mechanic operates the vehicle the mechanic repairs the vehicle, then maintenance is completed.
Whenever it is not the case that if maintenance is scheduled then provided that the mechanic operates the vehicle the mechanic repairs the vehicle, maintenance is not completed.

Provided that it is not the case that if the mechanic checks the certification then given that it is not the case that whenever neither the mechanic assembles the furniture nor disassembles the furniture the furniture is not stable, the furniture is not certified, the inspection passed.
If it is not the case that if the mechanic tests the tool then when the tool is not functional it is not broken, then cleaning is documented.
If it is not the case that if neither the mechanic assembles the furniture nor disassembles the furniture then the furniture is not stable, then the furniture is certified.
If the tool is not functional, then the tool is broken.
